item.description:
The Cambridge Historical Society has kindly offered to host a Meetup especially for Nerd Fun and Social Fun at the amazing Hooper Lee Nichols house, one of the two remaining 17th century houses left standing in Cambridge--on "Tory Row".

http://www.cambridgehistory.org/HLN_House/HLN_main.htm

The society is asking for a $5 contribution. This will be collected by a greeter at the entrance.

Period Costume: not necessary but invited!

This Meetup will last until 8 PM! So we can meetup! Bring your own food and drinks: allowed (designated area).

The first tour will be at 6 PM, the other at 7 PM. The gap in time is not "waiting" time it is socializing time. Be on time, there is a capacity of 25 participants per tour, for a total of 50 allowed for this Meetup.

These 2 special tours are offered courtesy of the Cambridge Historical Society:

http://www.cambridgehistory.org/ 

Parking will be facilitated; certificates are retrievable at the Hooper-Lee-Nichols House.

Note! We will be meeting again at Tommy Doyles (Harvard Square) to grab a bite at 8:30! (downstairs). In case that doesn't work out we'll be at Grendels Den, literally across the street.

People "going" would appreciate a ride if you're driving -- in return maybe riders can help pay parking. The Charles Hotel parking garage is the best deal but that is only an opinion.
item.name: Special Tours of the Hooper-Lee-Nichols House-- Cambridge
